results:
Based on the search results, I found information about "Mały Książę" (The Little Prince) appearing in Polish eighth-grade exams (egzamin ósmoklasisty) and matura exams. Here's what I found:

## "Mały Książę" in Polish Exams:

### Eighth-Grade Exam (Egzamin ósmoklasisty):

"Mały Książę" appeared in the 2025 eighth-grade Polish language exam. Students had to work with questions about friendship in the context of this book.

In the 2025 exam, students could reference "Mały Książę" and Harry Potter when discussing friendship themes, as practically any required reading containing friendship could be used with proper arguments.

The book "Mały Książę" appeared in the 2020 eighth-grade exam, where a fragment of the book was quoted. Students had to write what was described in the fragment and complete sentences with multiple choice answers, including "The pilot landed in the desert because".

"Mały Książę" by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry appeared in the 2019 eighth-grade exam and wasn't surprising, though the text by Krzysztof Teodor Toeplitz was.

### Types of Questions and Tasks:

Students had to evaluate whether statements were true or false, such as "The Pilot and the Little Prince decided to search for a well because they ran out of water" and "The Little Prince's proposal expressed in the words 'Let's look for a well' was met with joy by the pilot".

Other tasks included: "Referring to the entire work, write why the Little Prince decided to leave the Rose", "Referring to the entire work, write why the Little Prince decided to return to his planet", and "Which character from a required reading other than The Little Prince turned out to be a true friend?"(no content)Example true/false questions included: "All roses from 'The Little Prince' symbolize modesty" and "In 'The Little Prince' the fox embodies cunning and slyness".

### CKE Materials:

CKE (Central Examination Commission) prepared revision sets with 2 texts and 12 tasks with answers and explanations for "Mały Książę" by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry and "Mały Książę odnaleziony" (The Little Prince Found) by Jean-Pierre Davidts on March 20, 2020.

Educational materials include worksheets with 13 original exam-style tasks about "Mały Książę" by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry with answer keys.

The search results show that "Mały Książę" is a regularly featured text in Polish eighth-grade exams, with questions focusing on themes of friendship, character relationships, symbolism, and plot comprehension.
